segments.text: I'm looking at the left side of the kitchen now, where the kids are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly after the cookies in that large jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, the jar is labeled 'COOKIE JAR' â€“ how convenient!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body is stretched out, and he looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her hand out, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort between the two of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart jumps a little as I see how unstable that stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're attempting this with the woman so close by.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole secret operation is rather charming, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't take a tumble with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
